short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search on youtube through the right click menu.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple and powerful extension to quickly search selected terms on youtube.

This extension adds the "Search on YouTube" item to the context menu. 
This option appears only when text is selected and will open a new YouTube tab to search for the selected text.

This extension is free and open-source:
https://github.com/samuelpismel/search-on-youtube-chrome-extension
